CYANOBLOOM.comment: Subsurface bloom=1; Surface bloom=2. Each CYANOBLOOM pixel is the sum of all available values. Each pixel can have a value between 0 (no summer bloom detected) and 3 (both subsurface and surface summer blooms detected). Derived from RRS(550 nm and 670 nm) as in Brando et al., 2021
CYANOBLOOM.source: L3 ESA CCIv6 - BAL MLP Ensemble based on CDF
